summary: A squad of unsuspecting cops go through a trapdoor to Hell when they stumble upon a Black Mass in an abandoned building.
cast: Mehmet Cerrahoglu|Görkem Kasal|Ergun Kuyucu|Muharrem Bayrak|Fatih Dokgöz|Sabahattin Yakut|Berat Efe Parlar|Sevket Süha Tezel|Seyithan Özdemir|Sevinc Kaya|Mümin Kaar|Fulya Peker|Fadik Bülbül|Elif Dag|Mehmet Akif Budak|Derin Cankaya|Hayati Citaklar|Leman Sevda Daricioglu|Aslihan Erguvan|Serhat Mustafa Kiliç|Kerem Kurt|Alper Magriso|Tugba Ozkul|Burakhan Pasabeyoglu|Zafer Talibas|Murat Yaylagül|Ihsan Önal
keywords: frog|turkish horror|black mass|nightmare|remake by original director
title: Baskin
